title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: Special Order No. 191 (Extract), December 11, 1867
summary: An excerpt of an order from the Military District Headquarters overturns a court decision concerning the possession of a plot of land. The Military Commissioner granted the land to Jacob Pitman's widow, Margaret, instead of turning it over to an Isaac Crebs.
keywords: Property, Legal System, Military Authority, Women, American Civil War
